pullrequest.title: Added support for removing sensors at runtime

content.raw:
I’m having some trouble in figuring out this one, since we are using std::move on the function argument I can’t find any non-naive way to have both functions working at the same time \(where the naive way would be to also duplicate the createSensorCb object\).  
I thought about creating a new std::function that works as a bridge \(i.e. calls the newer one with a default argument for the gazebo Entity\) but that would make it impossible to use std::move.
